Type.Name: FindInternalChildFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate Gtk.Widget FindInternalChildFunc(XML xml, Widget parent, string childname);
.class public auto ansi sealed FindInternalChildFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.remarks: this delegate is used for custom methods to find the internal children of a widget.
